WashMach.Tooltip: Input the number of Washing Machine you want to install

clWashMach.Tooltip: In case there would be a washing machine, the class of the washing machine has to be selected. The classes follow the labels given by the Energy-using.Product directive of the EU. Classes have been divided into three categories in order to simplify the choice. A or B class, C or D class, E or F class
clWashMach.Comparefield: A or B class C or D class E or F class Self-defined
clWashMach.Exception: A or B class C or D class E or F class Self-defined
